cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 65 miles west of Cabo Cruz, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: continuing northwest across central/western Cuba, then toward the Florida Straits and the west coast of Florida

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and western Cuba, Florida Keys, and Florida’s west coast (not Puerto Rico)
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-storm–force winds expected at San Juan, PR in the next 5 days.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at San Juan, PR.
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall associated with Elsa forecast for San Juan, PR.
